attributes.action: Brunel University fees to be reimbursed for the duration of the strike action.
attributes.background: Whilst we wholeheartedly support the tutors’ strike, it is only logical that we students have our tuition fees reimbursed for the duration of the strike action. The strike means we loose 14 days worth of education, so we want to be reimbursed for that!

rejection.details:
The decision to refund student tuition fees would be responsibility of universities, rather than the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition asking the Government to make it law for universities to issue refunds when students don't receive lessons as a result of strikes.
